#if defined(USE_TEX_ADDR)
extern unsigned short m31_lut[];
extern unsigned char m31_tex[];
void *m31_tex_addr[] = {
#if defined(NON_PALETTE)
	0,
#else
	m31_lut,
#endif
#if defined(NON_TEXTURE)
	0,
#else
	m31_tex,
#endif
};
#endif

#if defined(USE_TEX_SIZE)
unsigned short m31_tex_size[] = { 36, 43, 4, 0, };
#endif
